Package sample.JavaFX.SearchImageScene

Class SearchImageSceneController

java.lang.Object
sample.JavaFX.SearchImageScene.SearchImageSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class SearchImageSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
SearchImageSceneController controls the SearchImageScene. Every method in this class is used to handle the different functionalities on the SearchImageScene. The class implements Initializable

    SearchImageSceneController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void handleAddTagButtonClicked()
    Button to handle when the add tag button is clicked
    void handleBackButtonClicked()
    A method for handling the backbutton.
    void handleCreateButtonClicked()
    Opens a dialog where the user enters the name of the new album.
    void handleGeneratePDFButtonClicked()
    Method for generating a pdf based on selected images IMPORTANT: Access to directory needs to be public, if a FileNotFoundException will be thrown
    void handleResetSearchButtonClicked()  
    void handleSearchButtonClicked()
    Handles the search button clicked.
    void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
    Initialize-method where we fill inn the images-arraylist with images from the database, and fill the scrollpane with all the SearchListItems.

    • SearchImageSceneController

      public SearchImageSceneController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize-method where we fill inn the images-arraylist with images from the database, and fill the scrollpane with all the SearchListItems.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - : URL
      resourceBundle - : ResourceBundle

    • handleSearchButtonClicked

      public void handleSearchButtonClicked()
      Handles the search button clicked. Goes through all input-fields and checks whether they are empty or not. Usese streams to filter through each criteria. At the end we reload the scrollpane with all the search-results and clear all input-fields.

    • handleBackButtonClicked

      public void handleBackButtonClicked()
      A method for handling the backbutton. Sends you back to mainscene.

    • handleResetSearchButtonClicked

      public void handleResetSearchButtonClicked()

    • handleAddTagButtonClicked

      public void handleAddTagButtonClicked()
      Button to handle when the add tag button is clicked

    • handleCreateButtonClicked

      public void handleCreateButtonClicked()
      Opens a dialog where the user enters the name of the new album. After that we go through all selected images and adds them to the new album.

    • handleGeneratePDFButtonClicked

      public void handleGeneratePDFButtonClicked() throws java.lang.Exception
      Method for generating a pdf based on selected images IMPORTANT: Access to directory needs to be public, if a FileNotFoundException will be thrown
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
